name: Ahoist Cratey
description:
This is a collaborative game made by members of the Thinky Puzzle Games Discord server, from August 30th 2020 to January 27th 2021. The format was an "exquisite corpse" style, where each person adds on a little bit (a level, a mechanic, and/or polish), and then passes it on.

Participants: (in order of participation, but not in order of levels) (25 total) 
jackk
Plurmorant
Noa
Marcos D

Dan Williams
Evan Malmud (crychair)

KristianHedeholm
jcGyo
Elyot
Joel
Portponky

The exported game uses pancelor's level select fork of Puzzlescript. The "hack" link will take you to the game's original source code, without the level select functionality.

This is the third iteration of this project format; this time two groups started from the same 'seed' game. Check out the companion game: Indiana Hat and the Temple of Puzz!
